mn101:7.2: vedhanahetu → vedanāhetu (bj, pts1ed, mr) | tibbā → tippā (bj, sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn101:11.7: Evaṁvādī → evaṁvādīsu (mr) | kañci → kiñci (bj, cck, pts1ed, mr)
mn101:12.1: Puna caparāhaṁ → puna ca parāhaṁ (pts1ed); puna ca panāhaṁ (mr)
mn101:14.1: tasmiṁ samaye opakkamikā dukkhā tibbā kaṭukā vedanā vediyetha → tiṭṭheyyeva tasmiṁ samaye … vedanā (sya-all, km, pts1ed)
mn101:23.5: yassa hi khvāssa → yassa kho hi panassa (si); yassa hi khvassa (sya-all); yassa khvāssa (pts1ed)
